title: Butter Chicken
description: A classic Indian dish of tender chicken pieces cooked in a creamy tomato gravy with butter and spices.

title: Dosa
description: A thin, crispy crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, often served with sambar ( lentil stew) and chutney.

title: Palak Paneer
description: Cottage cheese cubes cooked in a creamy spinach gravy with spices.

title: Biryani
description: A fragrant rice dish layered with meat, vegetables, and spices.

title: Naan
description: Soft, leavened flatbread cooked in a tandoor oven.

title: Samosa
description: A crispy fried or baked pastry filled with spiced potatoes and other vegetables.

title: Chole Bhature
description: Spicy chickpea curry served with fluffy fried bread (bhature).

title: Vada Pav
description: A potato fritter patty served in a pav (bread bun) with chutneys.

title: Idli
description: Soft, steamed rice cakes made from fermented rice and lentil batter.

title: Dhokla
description: A savory steamed cake made from fermented chickpea batter.

title: Aloo Gobi
description: Potatoes and cauliflower cooked in a spiced curry.

title: Malai Kofta
description: Vegetable dumplings cooked in a creamy tomato gravy.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Marinated chicken pieces grilled in a tandoor and cooked in a creamy tomato gravy.
